name: Luck of the Irish
description: We all make numerous choices everyday. Most are void of significant consequences, like your choice of breakfast cereal. Others can impact significantly on your life, such as quitting your job or having children. In ‘Luck of the Irish’, your choices could cost you your life. On a seemingly ‘normal’ Halloween evening (if there is such a thing), you find yourself at the mercy of a murderous leprechaun. In order to escape his wrath and avoid a torturous death, you must channel ‘Lady Luck’ to correctly solve a series of puzzles and navigate your way out of his maze-like lair before time runs out. Your life. Your luck. Your choices. Do you have the ‘Luck of the Irish’?
